Topic.Title: New Book Launch Game! Feedback and players wanted -  anyone?

Posts.EditableText:
Hello! 

I had this idea previously with my last book release, but this time I actually finished it!

I've put together a little companion game that gives players the chance to win a free eBook edition of my latest sci-fi novel 'The Great Connection: Worlds in Waiting' if they get through to the end.

I haven't got much time (I'm a full time data analyst when not writing) - so it is just a short offering.

I would love to hear what people think of the game, and the idea of it as a marketing tool / expanded Universe. 

Thanks for your help in advance! 

Garry Abbott

http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/egq0femjfug_wqbgv3nsew/the-great-connection-yalissa-speaking
